catalog_info.title: Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Applied Mathematics 21a and 21b, or Mathematics 21a and 21b.
catalog_info.description: Ordinary differential equations: power series solutions; special functions; eigenfunction expansions. Review of vector calculus. Elementary partial differential equations: separation of variables and series solutions; diffusion, wave and Laplace equations. Brief introduction to nonlinear dynamical systems and to numerical methods.
